forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers after midnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
